trends: There have been 12 other sightings in Visalia
There were no other sightings in Visalia on or around July 28th 2011
divs: Sighting DetailsOn July 25, 2011 I observed this event to the North East of Visalia CA for approximately 5 hours, then again July 26th I saw the same directly to the East of Visalia, CA, and tonight, July 28, 2011 I am seeing the same to the South East of Visalia, CA. On the first night I thought I saw a beam of light emitted and possible spark-like activity. The object at times appears to move further away and then return and gets dimmer and brighter and appears to rise extremely slowly but the stars around it rise faster. My friend also can see this same light right now from the town of Orosi, CA and it appears due South from him on Road 120 in Orosi, CA.
